I only care about money as a metric of success in crypto. Leaderboard points.

Money in of itself is of little interest to me. At peak net worth (which im still far away from) in 2021, I spent about $200-$300 monthly, was living in uni dorm with flatmate and was happy. Don'tâ€¦
